com.lowagie.text.pdf.codec

Class CCITTG4Encoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lowagie.text.pdf.codec.CCITTG4Encoder

  • public class CCITTG4Encoder
extends Object
    Encodes data in the CCITT G4 FAX format.
